smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'LibraryHandler' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Builder' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'PathUtils' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Class 'Builder' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Builder' with '18' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'IndexTransaction' with '18' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'SqliteTransaction' with '21' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'SqlTransaction' with '31' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'IndexHandler' with '15' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'SyncthingClient' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onCreateDialog appears to be too complex.
The function init appears to be too complex.
The function onCreateDialog appears to be too complex.
The function onCreate appears to be too complex.
The function getSessionInvitation appears to be too complex.
The function parse appears to be too complex.
The function parse appears to be too complex.
The function initDb appears to be too complex.
The function handleOption appears to be too complex.
The function pushFile appears to be too complex.
The function createInstance appears to be too complex.
The function generateConnectionActorsFromDeviceAddressList appears to be too complex.
The function handleReceivedClusterConfig appears to be too complex.
The function pullFile appears to be too complex.
The function streamDirectoryListing appears to be too complex.
The function updateFolderStatsCollector appears to be too complex.
The function queryAnnounceServer appears to be too complex.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function getSessionInvitation is nested too deeply.
Function parse is nested too deeply.
Function parse is nested too deeply.
Function handleOption is nested too deeply.
Function sendAnnounceMessage is nested too deeply.
Function parse is nested too deeply.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface IndexTransaction is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function updateFolderStats has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class SqlTransaction is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: NotImplementedDeclaration
smells.description: The NotImplementedDeclaration should only be used when a method stub is necessary. This defers the development of the functionality of this function. Hence, the NotImplementedDeclaration should only serve as a temporary declaration. Before releasing, this type of declaration should be removed.

smells.name: ConstructorParameterNaming
smells.description: Constructor parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

smells.name: MemberNameEqualsClassName
smells.description: A member should not given the same name as its parent class or object.

instances.message: A member is named after the class. This might result in confusion. Either rename the member or change it to a constructor.
A member is named after the class object. This might result in confusion. Please rename the member.
A member is named after the class. This might result in confusion. Either rename the member or change it to a constructor.

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'Instance.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'ConnectionActor'.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: context!!.getSystemService(Context.INPUT_METHOD_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to InputMethodManager.
findPreference("local_device_name") cannot be safely cast to EditTextPreference.
context!!.getSystemService(Context.CLIPBOARD_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to ClipboardManager.
arguments!!.getSerializable(ARG_FILE_SPEC) cannot be safely cast to DownloadFileSpec.
arguments!!.getSerializable(ARG_FILE_SPEC) cannot be safely cast to DownloadFileSpec.
arguments!!.getParcelable(ARG_SAVE_AS_URI) cannot be safely cast to Uri.
context!!.getSystemService(Context.CLIPBOARD_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to ClipboardManager.
arguments!!.getSerializable(DEVICES) cannot be safely cast to ArrayList<DeviceInfo>.
activity cannot be safely cast to IntroActivity?.
socketFactory.createSocket(socket, null, socket.port, true) cannot be safely cast to SSLSocket.
socketFactory.createSocket() cannot be safely cast to SSLSocket.
other cannot be safely cast to DeviceAddress.
url.openConnection() cannot be safely cast to HttpsURLConnection.

smells.name: IteratorNotThrowingNoSuchElementException
smells.description: The next() method of an Iterator implementation should throw a NoSuchElementException when there are no more elements to return

instances.message: This implementation of Iterator does not correctly implement the next() method as it doesn't throw a NoSuchElementException when no elements remain in the Iterator.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses around the lambda ( { onNavigationItemSelectedListener(it) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.

Parentheses in (if (config.useDefaultDiscoveryServers) DiscoveryServer.defaultDiscoveryServers else emptySet()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: if (config.useDefaultDiscoveryServers) DiscoveryServer.defaultDiscoveryServers else emptySet()
Parentheses around the lambda ({ it.isEmpty() }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses around the lambda ({ it.isEmpty() }) are unnecessary and can be removed.

            deltaFileCount == 0L &&
                    deltaDirCount == 0L &&
                    deltaSize == 0L &&
                    lastModified.time == 0L
            ) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: deltaFileCount == 0L &&
                    deltaDirCount == 0L &&
                    deltaSize == 0L &&
                    lastModified.time == 0L
Parentheses in (!wasIndexAcquiredBefore) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !wasIndexAcquiredBefore
Parentheses in (parentPath != null && parentEntry == null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: parentPath != null && parentEntry == null
Parentheses in (parentPath != null && parentEntry == null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: parentPath != null && parentEntry == null
